FAQ for This Card

Q117

July 04, 2025 Updated

I deploy this Unit when there are already five Units deployed into my battle area. At this time, what happens to the token deployed by this 【Deploy】 effect?

Place one Unit from among the Units already in your battle area into your trash, then deploy the token.

Q117

July 04, 2025 Updated

I deploy this Unit when there are already five Units deployed into my battle area. At this time, what happens to the token deployed by this 【Deploy】 effect?

Place one Unit from among the Units already in your battle area into your trash, then deploy the token.
